resources.string: Adapter: A subclass of RecyclerView.Adapter responsible for providing views that represent items in a data set. Position: The position of a data item within an Adapter. Index: The index of an attached child view as used in a call to getChildAt(int). Contrast with Position. Binding: The process of preparing a child view to display data corresponding to a position within the adapter. Dirty (view): A child view that must be rebound by the adapter before being displayed.
